text: Katherine Karen Dunn (October 24, 1945 - May 11, 2016) was an American novelist, journalist, voice artist, radio personality, book reviewer and poet. She was born in Garden City, Kansas, but was raised in Portland, Oregon. She was best known for the novel Geek Love (1989). Dunn died of lung cancer on May 11, 2016 in Portland, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== *An interview with Guernica Magazine about her new book, One Ring Circus *What The Hell Ever Happened To... Katherine Dunn?
